title: Front-End Software Engineer
html:
• Development: Scalable web applications with high performance with React/NextJS.
  • Performance: optimizations of bundle/SSR/cache/CDN
  • Integrations:robust REST/GraphQL consumption with caching, error and loading states
  • Quality: Jest/Playwright and CI/CD (coverage, lint, type checks) reducing regressions.
  • Global collaboration: daily cooperation with international cross-functional multicultural teams (Design / PM / BE / QA), synchronizing releases across several time zones with English-first sync/async docs.
